publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7575 Stuart McMillan: Scottish Green Energy Awards, Recognising Renewables Championsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the individuals and organisations the length and breadth of Scotland that have been honoured at the Scottish Green Energy Awards 2010, which was organised by Scottish Renewables and sponsored by RWE npower renewables, for what it considers their outstanding contribution to the growth of the renewable energy industry, which has seen Scotland reach the milestone of four gigawatt capacity, enough to provide more than 30% of its electricity needs.
